messages.noPrivateMessages: You cannot issue this command in DM's
messages.voiceChannelNeeded: You must be in a voice channel to use this command.
messages.cannotConnect: I am unable to join your voice channel, make sure I have the required permmisions
messages.sameVoiceChannel: You must be in the same vocal channel as the bot to be able to listen to music.
messages.noMoreSongs: There is no more songs in the playlist.
messages.volBeetween: Volume must be a number between `0` and `100`!
messages.validNumberPosition: The position must be a valid number higher than `0`.
messages.couldNotBeFound: This sound could not be found.
messages.restrictedOrNotFound: This song is restricted or could not be found!

messages.errorWhileParsingVideo: An error occured while searching the video if this error persists please contact Santi#0001
messages.errorWhileParsingPlaylist: An error occured while parsing the playlist songs, if this error persists please contact Santi#0001.
